dynamorio::drmemtrace::trace_metadata_writer_t Struct Reference

#include <raw2trace.h>

Detailed Description

Functions for encoding memtrace data headers. Each function returns the number of bytes the write operation required: sizeof(trace_entry_t). The buffer is assumed to be sufficiently large.
